item.title: The Dev Theatre Podcast Episode 001
item.description: https://devtheatre.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/The+Dev+Theatre+1.mp3 Expanding on his talk “You Really Don’t Need All That Javascript”, listen to Stuart and I chat about npm, dependency management, Deno, and standard libraries.
